fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"content":"var params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar actualData=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\n//console.log(actualData);\\nvar DRtype=actualData.type;\\nif(DRtype === \\"DRB\\"){\\n MeetingDRBPanel.visible=true;\\n MeetingDRAPanel.visible=false; \\n}\\nelse if(DRtype === \\"DRA\\"){\\n MeetingDRAPanel.visible=true;\\n MeetingDRBPanel.visible=false; \\n}\\nif(actualData.userRole.toString().toUpperCase()===\\"DRB_CHAIR\\"||actualData.userRole.toString().toUpperCase()===\\"DRA\\"){\\n MeetingDRBPanel.enabled=true;\\n MeetingDRAPanel.enabled=true;\\n}\\nelse{\\n MeetingDRBPanel.enabled=false;\\n MeetingDRAPanel.enabled=false;\\n}"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.MeetingInfoMainPanel"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
